name: infura-mcp-server
description: An MCP server for the Infura API, providing tools to interact with the Ethereum blockchain.

scripts.test: npm run test:validate && npm run test:tools
scripts.test:validate: node -e "console.log('✅ Package validation passed'); const pkg = require('./package.json'); if (!pkg.name || !pkg.version) throw new Error('Invalid package.json');"
scripts.test:tools: node -e "console.log('✅ Testing tools discovery...'); require('./lib/tools.js').discoverTools().then(tools => console.log('✅ Discovered', tools.length, 'tools')).catch(err => { console.error('❌ Tools test failed:', err.message); process.exit(1); });"

author: qbandev
